data.text: @chadbensonshow Problem with vaccine mandate is not including natural immunity from having covid. I have given vaccinations because they need the card to go to school, but they just had covid. I told them in 3 months they may need to get their 1st and 2nd dose again to be protected long term.
@chadbensonshow If everyone else can play by the rules, Kyrie can too. No special treatment because he plays well.
